Augusta-Richmond_County.Southview Cemetery:
Southview Cemetery which is located in Augusta, Georgia on 1102 Nellieville Rd and 15th Avenue in an area known as "The Avenues". The area became a 15-acre cemetery in the 1910s.


== History ==
As other cemeteries were at maximum capacity, and were being closed by the city, the need of more space for burials was desperately needed.
